title: How AI is Transforming Digital Marketing
summary: AI-driven tools are revolutionizing the way marketers approach campaigns, analytics, and customer engagement.
content:
AI-driven tools are revolutionizing the way marketers approach campaigns, analytics, and customer engagement. From content generation to predictive analytics, AI is making marketing smarter and more efficient than ever before.

In this article, we explore the top trends and real-world examples of AI in marketing.
author: Amit Sharma

title: Getting Started with AI Marketing Agents
summary: Learn how to make the most of our platform, from onboarding to advanced features.
content: Our platform is designed to be intuitive and powerful. In this guide, we walk you through the basics of setting up your account, exploring AI tools, and maximizing your results.
author: Priya Patel
